title: "[Feature]: "

---

> Please review our [Code of Conduct](../../CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md) before submitting.

## Problem Statement
What problem does this feature solve? Who is impacted?

## Proposed Solution
Describe the behavior you would like to see. Include UI, API, or workflow changes.

## Success Criteria
What does success look like? List measurable outcomes if possible.

## Alternatives Considered
List any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Additional Context
Add any other context, mockups, or references to related issues.
